feature.label: HiTS imaging feature
feature.description:
Basic imaging nodes to support import using Bio-Formats (based on revision 5528).
Be careful! It does not work properly with the heatmaps from version 0.4.0. You have to choose which would you like to use. (Release after this will fix this problem.)
